description:
expectation of the duration of the operating time between failures 
Note 1 to entry:.
Note 1 Mean operating time between failures should only be applied to repairable items. For non-repairable items, see mean operating time to failure, see IEV192-05-11:2015-02 

Note 2 Terms 'mean' is used as synonym  to the term arithmetic mean.

i18nValue.zh_CN: 连续故障之间的平均运行时间
